ai.grakn.concept

Interface Rule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<Concept>, Concept, Instance

    public interface Rule
extends Instance

    A rule which defines how implicit knowledge can extracted.

    It can behave like any other Instance but primarily serves as a way of extracting implicit data from the graph. By defining the LHS (if statment) and RHS (then conclusion) it is possible to automatically materialise new concepts based on these rules.

    Author:
    fppt
